channel.title: Hosting Server on a ... Server!
channel.description:
What exactly do I need to look for that would be able to host a server 24/7, and around how much would it cost me? How would I be able to run/restart the server etc? Is this even possible?
By the way, I have a domain already and a web host. I'd like to know if I can do it with what I already have, because my DSL connection is not really working wonders when 8 people are logged on and it starts to lag...
My web host is at www.ucvhost.com.

item.title: Hosting Server on a ... Server!
item.dc:creator: @wldworld.no-ip.org wldworld.no-ip.org
item.description:
@wldworld.no-ip.org wrote:

$150 for 6 months is still $25 a month – for that I could be on cable or fiber optics.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting Server on a ... Server!
item.dc:creator: @Wildy321 Wildy321
item.description:
@Wildy321 wrote:

On another topic

A instant messenger program that is a waste of system resources.

Oh so if i got rid of my MSN Messenger, and my AOL program (that is the biggest program on my computer) It would make my computer run faster?

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting Server on a ... Server!
item.dc:creator: @Wildy321 Wildy321
item.description:
@Wildy321 wrote:

[quote=“ZeroFreeze, post:3, topic:79642”]RAM is virtual memory… Maybe =|

Well, if you have skype, I’d recommend to uninstall it and permanently kill the process. Cause it’s a waste of system resources.[/quote]

What is skype?

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting Server on a ... Server!
item.dc:creator: @Wildy321 Wildy321
item.description:
@Wildy321 wrote:

Well, something that might help is to use certain soft ware to clean all the junk off your computer. try googleing “Download Ad-Aware” once you get it run it, it should clear off a bunch of junk that slow down your computer.

And yeah DSL is slow i have it too…

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting Server on a ... Server!
item.dc:creator: @wldworld.no-ip.org wldworld.no-ip.org
item.description:
@wldworld.no-ip.org wrote:

Ok, I talked to my host and they said that I needed a dedicated server… which they would provide for $350 a month.

DSL internet is quite slow, do you think this is the problem or is it my PC (2.0 ghz, 512mb ram, 180gb hard drive)? Do you think adding a bit of RAM would help the speed at all?

If not, is there anything I can remove from my files that are unused to speed up the server a bit?

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting Server on a ... Server!
item.dc:creator: @wldworld.no-ip.org wldworld.no-ip.org
item.description:
@wldworld.no-ip.org wrote:

I figured he was post whoring, like pretty much everyone else on these forums.

Anyway, thank you for your intelligent response. I found a cheap VPS host, but I don’t know if it’s BS or what because the price is pretty low (http://www.westhost.com/package-compare.html) compared to the other ones I looked at. In the meantime I am going to contact my current host and see if they will help me out.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting Server on a ... Server!
item.dc:creator: @The_Almost The Almost
item.description:
@The_Almost wrote:

yes just get the source and edit it. and make sure you have it ready for people to play on it.

Read full topic
